string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Spend, get your paycheck, pay bills, invest, earn interest, and more—no catch, no commitment. Learn More
Get your paycheck, pay rent, buy groceries, jump on potential market opportunities, and more—all in one easy-to-use app. Learn More
Use the Robinhood debit card nearly anywhere Mastercard® is accepted and at more ATMs than the top three banks combined. Learn More
Earn interest on your cash while having full access to it. Banks in our program pay the interest—we pass it on to you. Learn More
There are no overdrafts, account minimums, transfer fees, foreign transaction fees, etc. See our fee schedule to learn more. Learn More
You’re covered with Mastercard Zero Liability Protection and up to $1.25 million of FDIC insurance from the program banks. Learn More
